title: Kourtney Kardashian, 40, explains why she invited Sofia Richie, 21, along on her Finland vacation
text:
Kourtney Kardashian has a family trip to Finland planned alongside ex Scott Disick, and she doesn't mind some extra company.

'I'm going to Finland for spring break,' she told sister Khloe in a clip from Sunday's new Keeping Up With The Kardashians.

The 40-year-old Poosh founder first planned the vacation for her kids Mason, Penelope and Reign, but told Khloe that she extended an invite to Sofia Richie, Scott's girlfriend of two years, as well.

A great idea? Kourtney Kardashian reveals she invited Sofia Richie along on a family trip with ex Scott and their kids in a teaser for Sunday's new Keeping Up With The Kardashians

Honest: 'They don't make me feel like I'm left out though, which is nice,' Kourtney told sister Khloe as they drove in LA

'I just said to Scott, like, "Do you want to invite Sofia?"' Kourtney - who seems to be dating Younes Bendjima again - said.

'You are such a great co-parenter,' Khloe responded.

Kourtney then put a highlight on how well she, Scott and Sofia get along together.

'They don't make me feel like I'm left out though, which is nice,' she said. 'Or else I wouldn't go, or invite [Sofia] to come.'

Khloe then asked an insightful question: 'So, can I ask a question. Has anyone asked how she feels?'

Hmmm? Khloe then asked an insightful question: 'So, can I ask a question. Has anyone asked how she feels?'

Kourtney acknowledged that any conversations about Sofia's emotions should be between her and Scott.

'I feel like that's up to them, to have their conversations,' she said.

The public got a sneak peek of how the winter getaway actually went down in a teaser dropped October 1.

Awkward: The public got a sneak peek of how the winter getaway actually went down in a teaser dropped October 1

Scott was heard saying, 'It is a really awkward situation,' as Kourtney joined him and Sofia at the table during the trip.

Kourtney then says 'it's bizarre' as the camera pans to her face serving a tense glare.

In the next scene, Kourtney is on the couch with Scott as he tells her: 'I want you and Sofia to be comfortable,' adding that 'It does, like, take a toll on me.'

Heated: Kourtney then says 'it's bizarre' as the camera pans to her face serving a tense glare

Uncomfortable: The clip closed out with Scott saying: 'This trip has so much pressure' after Kourtney and Sofia are seen in the hot tub with annoyed looks on their faces

Sofia and Scott are eating at the table in the next clip when Sofia comments: 'You're more sophisticated with me when Kourtney is around.'

Scott and Kourtney are then seen sharing a laugh in the kitchen.

The clip closed out with Scott saying: 'This trip has so much pressure' after Kourtney and Sofia are seen in the hot tub with annoyed looks on their faces.
description: Kourtney Kardashian has a family trip to Finland planned alongside ex Scott Disick, and she doesn't mind some extra company.
